title: How to incrementally change our old process to new approach focused on customer experience - Quora

response.answer_text: I recommend starting with one or two teams in particular. I think leadership and management are in a great place, especially as we’ve all gone remotely in our businesses due to Covid19 pandemic. Some people were remote to start with of course, but a lot of businesses have disbanded in gone out of office. So for a leader or a manager to be able to communicate with his or her team of eight people or 80 people or 800 people, video is a great way to do this where you don’t need to call a meeting and everyone needs to drop what they’re doing.
